solution_line_template: When Trevor is {trevor_age_now}, his older brother will be {trevor_age_now} x {multiplier} = <<{trevor_age_now}*{multiplier}={brother_target_age}>>{brother_target_age} years old.
Trevor’s older brother is {brother_age_now} - {trevor_age_now} = <<{brother_age_now}-{trevor_age_now}={age_difference}>>{age_difference} years older than Trevor.

Since Trevor is {age_difference} years younger, Trevor will be {brother_target_age} - {age_difference} = <<{brother_target_age}-{age_difference}={trevor_age_when_brother_target}>>{trevor_age_when_brother_target} years old.
